page.title: 14EVENTS
page.content: The Flower Show was started 120 years ago by Mr.Prior.The 1985 show is special because the fireworks display is back,costing Â£1000. In the Flower Show field are tents exhibiting handicrafts,flowers,fruit and vegetables,floral art,needlework, cookery and wine. There is also a Punch and Judy show for children.The Southminster majorettes do a display of baton dancing to music.Other entertainments include Brian Bowdens sheepdog display Morris dancing,a tug-o-war between teams of local Cubs and the childrens races,also Nicholls fair with its various rides and stalls. The finals of the tennis tournaments are held throughout the afternoon.A grand prize draw is organised,the first prize being Â£100.
